name: Javamergingtree
body:
### Merging tree excersice

Below, there are two files with data about two trees:

- File1 --> slash separated paths
A/B/C : 1
A/B : 1
A1/B1/C : 1

- File2 --> dot or slash separated paths
A.C : 1
A.B : 1
A.B.D : 3
A.B.C : 1
A2/B/C : 4

Expected result : 
A : 8
A/B : 7
A/B/C : 2
A/B/D : 3
A/C : 1
A1 : 1
A1/B1 : 1
A1/B1/C : 1
A2 : 4
A2/B : 4 
A2/B/C : 4

It is needed to merge the two trees and generate a full layout of the tree. 

### Merging tree solution
A Java test case is implemented which loads two files, merge the two trees and generate a full description of the tree.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
